channel.title: Community game competition!
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt]Isketch and Minigolf[/size] [/center]
Moparscape had some chess game, but that's boring and I suck at chess so Moparcraft gets to have a funner game! Playray minigolf/and isketch both are very fun games which provide quite a lot of laughs they are both played on the IRC quite regularly.
Before I get into specifics I'm going to be running a few fun games so just come on the IRC in #moparcraft to come and play either one, please also say if you're going to take part in the tournament.
Once a few have joined I will start laying things out.
